rows.label: qev050102_MSG0001
rows.name:
You must be the one my master sent. Well met!
I have awaited you for far too long![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_JNK0010
rows.name: Hail Boldly

rows.label: qev050102_SEL0011
rows.name: Respond in an equally grand fashion.

rows.label: qev050102_JNK0020
rows.name: Reply Calmly

rows.label: qev050102_SEL0021
rows.name:
Respond to Gi Ziordo's impressive
greeting in a calm, steady tone.

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0002
rows.name: A fine roar for such a tiny [ST:gender p1=fellow p2=lass ]! Most entertaining![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0003
rows.name:
You are a welcome change from the limp company of
Gi Ziorde.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0004
rows.name:
My heart races in anticipation. Come! Hurry!
Let the match begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0005
rows.name: What? Speak up, human! Be heard![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0006
rows.name: You sound like that mewling weakling Gi Ziorde![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0007
rows.name:
...And yet you have earned the faith of my master.
So I have no doubt that your demeanor masks a set of
well-honed fangs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0008
rows.name:
Ah, my pulse pounds in anticipation. Come! Hurry!
Let the match begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0009
rows.name:
I am Gi Ziordo, hero among Wrothians!
Courageous and bold, fierce and fearless![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0010
rows.name:
I argued the proper methods of war long and loud
with Gi Ziorde.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0011
rows.name: With this battle, I will prove that mine is the only truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0012
rows.name: Stand you ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0013
rows.name: Then let our duel begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0014
rows.name: Word has reached me of your victory over Gi Ziorde.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0015
rows.name: Did you find him a formidable fighter?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev050102_SEL0111
rows.name: Say that Gi Ziorde's agile swordplay overwhelmed you.

rows.label: qev050102_JNK0120
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev050102_SEL0121
rows.name: Claim that Gi Ziorde was not much of a challenge.

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0016
rows.name:
Ha! You must not be a warrior true if you were
overwhelmed by a weakling such as he.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0017
rows.name:
Well said! A weakling such as he will never rise to true
mastery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0018
rows.name: But do not expect the same tepid performance from me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0019
rows.name:
I am Gi Ziordo, hero among Wrothians!
Courageous and bold, fierce and fearless![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0020
rows.name:
I argued the proper methods of war long and loud with
Gi Ziorde.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0022
rows.name: Stand you ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev050102_MSG0023
rows.name: Then let our duel begin![ST:wait ]
